title: HTML/XHTML Filter Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi HTML/XHTML Filter Filter

configurations.name: HTML
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: false
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)
  '.+':
      ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
      conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

configurations.name: HTML (Well-Formed)
configurations.parametersRaw:
# Rule types that drive HTML parser behavior
# INLINE inline element
# GROUP group element
# EXCLUDE exclude this element and all children
# INCLUDE exceptions to the exclude rules
# TEXTUNIT make this element a textunit with skeleton before/after
# PRESERVE_WHITESPACE turn on preserve whitespace.
# SCRIPT Embedded scripting languatge - pass to another extractor
# SERVER Embedded server language tags such as JSP, PHP, Mason etc.
# ATTRIBUTE_TRANS, ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE, ATTRIBUTE_READONLY, ATTRIBUTE_ID these rules list an attribute, not an element
# ATTRIBUTES_ONLY only attribute is translatable or localizable

#*********************************************************************************************
# Operators for attribute value compare
#
# Rules are of the form:
# TO_EXTRACT_ATTRIBUTE:[IF_HAS_ATTRIBUTE, OPERATOR, VALUE]
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, 'keywords']
#
# This rule would read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'keywords'
#
# Multiple attribute values may be included in a list:
# 'content':['http-equiv', EQUALS, ['content-language', 'content-type']]
#
# This rule would be read:
# extract the value of 'content' if the value of 'http-equiv' equals 'content-language' or 'content-type'
#*******************************************************************************************/

# EQUALS
# NOT_EQUALS
# MATCH regex match. Must match the entire attribute value

# ELEMENT AND ATTRIBUTE NAMES MUST BE LOWER CASED!!!!!!

assumeWellformed: true
preserve_whitespace: false

attributes:
  # attributes that occur on many elements
  dir:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]
    allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]
    # HTML5 now allows title on all HTML elements
    # allElementsExcept: [base, basefront, head, html, meta, param, script, title]

  lang:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  'xml:lang':
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_WRITABLE]

  #id:
  #  ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_ID]
  #  onlyTheseElements: [address, dt, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, legend, li, marquee, p, pre, td, th]

  aria-label:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTE_TRANS]

# ??? accesskey (see doc of translate)
#     https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/dom.html#the-translate-attribute
# ??? cite - Link to the source of the quotation or more information about the edit
#   it is a url, so it might be treated the same as href

elements:
  # only attributes are localizable or translatable - no PCDATA
  # ATTRIBUTES_ONLY with translatableAttributes implies the tag will be a TEXTUNIT
  # with embedded skeleton
  meta:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: {content: [[http-equiv, EQUALS, keywords], [name, EQUALS, [keywords, description, twitter:title, twitter:description, og:title, og:description, og:site_name]]]}
    writableLocalizableAttributes: {content: [http-equiv, EQUALS, [content-language, content-type]], charset}
    readOnlyLocalizableAttributes: {content: [name, EQUALS, [generator, author, progid, date]]}

  area:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, area, alt, download]
    # download: whether to download the resource instead of navigating to it, and its file name if so

  isindex:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [prompt]

  option:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  # Group rules
  dl:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  menu:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ol:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  optgroup:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  select:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  table:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]
    translatableAttributes: [summary]

  tbody:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tfoot:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  thead:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  tr:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  ul:
    ruleTypes: [GROUP]

  # complex TextUnit rules
  address:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dt:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  dd:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h1:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h2:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h3:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h4:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h5:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  h6:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  legend:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]
    idAttributes: [id]

  li:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [value]
    idAttributes: [id]

  marquee:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  p:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]
    elementType: paragraph

  pre:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT, PRESERVE_WHITESPACE]
    idAttributes: [id]

  td:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    translatableAttributes: [abbr]
    idAttributes: [id]

  th:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  title:
    ruleTypes: [TEXTUNIT]
    idAttributes: [id]

  track:
    translatableAttributes: [label, srclang]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]
    # can we do "something smart" with the kind? Note?
    # this really needs a lang attribute, check that it is updated

  # inline tags
  a:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: link
    translatableAttributes: [title, accesskey, download]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  audio:
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [src]

  abbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  acronym:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  applet:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [alt]

  b:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: bold

  base:
    ruleTypes: [ATTRIBUTES_ONLY]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href]

  bdo:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  big:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  blink:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# Seems to cause error
#  blockquote:
#    writableLocalizableAttributes: [cite]

  br:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  button:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, value]

  cite:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  code:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  del:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  dfn:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  em:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  embed:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  font:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  i:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: italic

  iframe:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [srcdoc]
    # src doc is messy, it can be a full html doc, needs parsing.

  img:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: image
    translatableAttributes: [title, alt]
    writableLocalizableAttributes: [href, src]

  input:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes:
      alt: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      value: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      accesskey: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      title: [type, NOT_EQUALS, [file, hidden, image, Password]]
      placeholder: [type, NOT_EQUALS, 'dummy']

  ins:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  kbd:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  label:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey]

  map:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

# causes null pointer it seems
#  menu:
#    translatableAttributes: [label]

  menuitem:
    translatableAttributes: [label]

  nobr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  object:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [standby]

  param:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [value]

  q:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  s:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  samp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  small:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  span:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  spacer:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strike:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  strong:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sub:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  sup:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  textarea:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    translatableAttributes: [accesskey, placeholder]

  tt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  u:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]
    elementType: underlined

  var:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  wbr:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Ruby inline tags
  ruby:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rb:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rt:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rp:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rbc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  rtc:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Robo help inline tags
  symbol:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  face:
    ruleTypes: [INLINE]

  # Excluded elements
  '.*':
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'no']

  # Included elements (must have both rules!!!)
  '.+':
    ruleTypes: [INCLUDE]
    conditions: [translate, EQUALS, 'yes']

  style:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  stylesheet:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

  # javascript etc.
  script:
    ruleTypes: [EXCLUDE]

# Todo, complicated:
# styles in the style attribute and element
# need updating for directions, alignemnts, offsets, margins (rtl)
# Take a look at CSSJanus: https://github.com/cssjanus/cssjanus
# Also need translation for 'content'
# Might also be nice to change fonts

simplifierRules.description: Rules for simplifying inline code representation

assumeWellformed.description: Assume input HTML is well-formed XML. Faster but may fail on non-conforming HTML.

attributes.description: Global attribute extraction rules  maps attribute names to their rule configuration

elements.description: Element extraction rules  maps element names to their rule configuration

elementRule.description: Extraction rule for an HTML/XML element

ruleTypes.description: Extraction rule types for this element

elementType.description: Element type hint (e.g. bold, italic, link, image, paragraph)

conditions.description: Conditions for this rule: [attributeName, operator, value]

attributeRule.description: Global extraction rule for an HTML/XML attribute

allElementsExcept.description: Apply to all elements except these

conditionalAttributeValue.description: Conditional attribute value  null (unconditional) or array of condition triples [attrName, operator, value/values]

x-groups.label: Inline Code Handling
x-groups.description: Configure detection and handling of inline codes (placeholders, tags, etc.)

x-groups.label: Whitespace Handling
x-groups.description: Control how whitespace is processed in extracted text
